Generators for open variants of the original '70s D6 SF RPG.

<!-- The following examples are autogenerated, do not change by hand! -->
<!-- BEGIN EXAMPLES -->

    
    $ go build .
    
    $ go install .
    
    $ d6
    Usage: d6 <verb> [verb] ...
    Verbs:
    	chars
    	worlds
    
    $ d6 chars
